20101223171046.000|20101223171049.000|TR0|doctors tell me this is a serious problem. 
20101223171049.000|20101223171052.000|TR0| And we don't hear much about it, but some 
20101223171052.000|20101223171054.000|TR0|150 drugs are in shortage.  And we're 
20101223171054.000|20101223171057.000|TR0|talking about important drugs like 
20101223171057.000|20101223171100.000|TR0|Epinephrine, important drugs like 
20101223171100.000|20101223171103.000|TR0|morphine, cancer drugs.

20101223171109.000|20101223171112.000|TR0|sometimes and can't get the dose that they 
20101223171112.000|20101223171115.000|TR0|need because the drug is in shortage.  
20101223171115.000|20101223171117.000|TR0|And, in fact, we're told by the Institute 
20101223171117.000|20101223171120.000|TR0|for Safe Medication Practices that at 
20101223171120.000|20101223171123.000|TR0|least three people have died because the 
20101223171123.000|20101223171126.000|TR0|medications they needed weren't there.
20101223171126.000|20101223171129.000|TR0|
20101223171129.000|20101223171132.000|TR0|HARRIS:  Do we know how and maybe why this 
20101223171132.000|20101223171135.000|TR0|is happening?
20101223171135.000|20101223171138.000|TR0|
20101223171138.000|20101223171140.000|TR0|COHEN:  You know, it's sort of this 
20101223171140.000|20101223171143.000|TR0|confluence of problems, a perfect storm, 
20101223171143.000|20101223171146.000|TR0|if you will.  So, for example, some drug 
20101223171146.000|20101223171149.000|TR0|companies don't have the raw materials 
20101223171149.000|20101223171152.000|TR0|that they need.  Other drug companies, 
20101223171152.000|20101223171155.000|TR0|their factories have been closed down for 
20101223171155.000|20101223171158.000|TR0|quality issues.
20101223171158.000|20101223171201.000|TR0|
20101223171201.000|20101223171204.000|TR0|And also, some drug companies, we're told, 
20101223171204.000|20101223171206.000|TR0|they're finding they're not making much 
20101223171206.000|20101223171209.000|TR0|money off of a given drug, so they just 
20101223171209.000|20101223171212.000|TR0|stop making it and nobody else wants to 
20101223171212.000|20101223171215.000|TR0|make it.  And there's nothing illegal 
20101223171215.000|20101223171218.000|TR0|about that.  That's just a business 
20101223171218.000|20101223171221.000|TR0|decision, but it leaves patients in the 
20101223171221.000|20101223171224.000|TR0|lurch.
20101223171224.000|20101223171227.000|TR0|
20101223171227.000|20101223171229.000|TR0|HARRIS:  Yes.  And what's an empowered 
20101223171229.000|20101223171232.000|TR0|patient to do in this situation?
20101223171232.000|20101223171235.000|TR0|
20101223171235.000|20101223171238.000|TR0|COHEN:  You know, what you want to do is 
20101223171238.000|20101223171241.000|TR0|if you're in the hospital -- because this 
20101223171241.000|20101223171244.000|TR0|is a hospital situation, not a pharmacy 
20101223171244.000|20101223171247.000|TR0|situation, this is a hospital situation -- 
20101223171247.000|20101223171250.000|TR0|you can ask -- if you're concerned, you 
20101223171250.000|20101223171252.000|TR0|can ask your doctor, hey, is there a 
20101223171252.000|20101223171255.000|TR0|shortage -- I've heard about it, I've 
20101223171255.000|20101223171258.000|TR0|heard about the shortage -- is there a 
20101223171258.000|20101223171301.000|TR0|shortage of any of the drugs that I'm 
20101223171301.000|20101223171304.000|TR0|supposed to have?  And if so, what are we 
20101223171304.000|20101223171307.000|TR0|doing about it?
20101223171307.000|20101223171310.000|TR0|
20101223171310.000|20101223171313.000|TR0|Because if they're substituting drugs, you 
20101223171313.000|20101223171315.000|TR0|want to ask your doctor, hey, are you 
20101223171315.000|20101223171318.000|TR0|familiar with working with this drug?  Is 
20101223171318.000|20101223171321.000|TR0|it hard to dose this drug?  Because what 
20101223171321.000|20101223171324.000|TR0|they're doing is sometimes substituting 
20101223171324.000|20101223171327.000|TR0|with drugs that doctors and nurses haven't
